title._content: [Portrait of Bill Cogliano, Joseph Kowalewski, Carl Ottobrino, Stanley Kraft, Dick Motzlinski, Manny Thaler, Sol Libero, Mack Pierce, Stanley M. Aronson, Vincent Carbone, and Tex Beneke, New York, N.Y., ca. June 1947] (LOC)

description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Bill Cogliano, Joseph Kowalewski, Carl Ottobrino, Stanley Kraft, Dick Motzlinski, Manny Thaler, Sol Libero, Mack Pierce, Stanley M. Aronson, Vincent Carbone, and Tex Beneke, New York, N.Y., ca. June 1947] 1 negative : b&w ; 2 1/4 x 2 1/4 in. Caption from Down Beat: Here's the front line of the Glenn Miller orchestra, conducted by Tex Beneke. What a payroll! There are only 10 men here, but there are 20 more, plus a vocal group, in back of them. Left to right: Bill Cogliano, Joseph Kowalewski, Carl Ottobrino, Stanley Kraft, Dick Motzlinski, Manny Thaler, Sol Libero, Mack Pierce, Stanley Aronson, Vincent Carbone and Tex. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 026 Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). In: "Beneke band," Down Beat, v. 14, no. 13 (June 18, 1947), p. 12. Subjects: Cogliano, Bill Kowalewski, Joseph Ottobrino, Carl Kraft, Stanley Motzlinski, Dick Thaler, Manny Libero, Sol Pierce, Mack Aronson, Stanley M., 1922- Carbone, Vincent Beneke, Tex Glenn Miller Orchestra Jazz musicians--1940-1950. Big bands--1940-1950. Saxophonists--1940-1950. Violinists--1940-1950. Format: Portrait photographs--1940-1950. Cityscape photographs--1940-1950. Film negatives--1940-1950. Rights Info: Mr. Gottlieb has dedicated these works to the public domain, but rights of privacy and publicity may apply. lcweb2.loc.gov/diglib/ihas/html/gottlieb/gottlieb-copyrig... Repository: (negative) Library of Congress, Prints & Photographs Division, Washington D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (DLC) 99-401005 General information about the Gottlieb Collection is available at lcweb2.loc.gov/diglib/ihas/html/gottlieb/gottlieb-home.html Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.music/gottlieb.09771 Call Number: LC-GLB23- 0977
